title: My Pixel 3 finger print sensor quit working. It keeps saying that the sensor is dirty. Bad phone?
content: My finger print sensor quit working.  It says to clean the sensor.  Did that several times - nothing changed.  Did I just simply buy a crappy phone?  Verizon pretty much says I am SOL>  I have up graded the software and tried everything short of throwing it against the wall which will come next....SUGGESTIONS??
